text: Arau mora banda'i yetiya mora bisaye tomaka sodhe, (tetiya tumi kai diya) niscaya ma'i ati ocarata. Ma'i praarthanakaraira praarthana kabula karao, yetiya si praarthana karae. Eteke sihamte'o yena mora ahbanata samharai diye arau mora prati imana ane, yate sihamta sathika pathata paraicalita haâ€™ba parae
